formulas.expression: if(ISBLANK({!V_Refunded_Items}) , "" , BR() ) + "- SKU: " + {!L10_Original_ROLIs.Product2.StockKeepingUnit} + "; Quantity: " + TEXT({!L10_Original_ROLIs.QuantityReceived}) + "; UnitPrice: " + TEXT({!L10_Original_ROLIs.OrderItemSummary.GrossUnitPrice}) + "; TotalAmount: " +TEXT({!L10_Original_ROLIs.OrderItemSummary.TotalAmtWithTax})

fields.name: Display_Zone5
fields.fieldText:
⛔

Error while creating refund

fields.name: Display_Zone5_0
fields.fieldText:
⛔

Error while creating CreditMemo/Ensure Refund

fields.name: TXT_10_02
fields.fieldText:
We have detected that Items in this Return Order are coming from an Exchange Order.


A special process will now start.

fields.name: TXT_20_02
fields.fieldText:
We have detected multiple Original Return Orders.


Unfortunately we are not able to handle this use case yet.


This Flow will now stop.

fields.name: TXT_25_02
fields.fieldText:
We have detected multiple Original ChangeOrders.


Unfortunately we are not able to handle this use case yet.


This Flow will now stop.

fields.name: TXT_40_02
fields.fieldText: Cannot generate Refund. Refund exceeds the available refund.

fields.name: TXT_99_02
fields.fieldText:
Refund {!Get_Created_Refund_Number.RefundNumber} 

and Credit Memo {!Get_New_CreditMemo.DocumentNumber}

have been successfully created.
